trans-unit.source: Defines a lifetime lease object that is used by the remoting lifetime service.
Distributed garbage collection controls when server applications can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Distribuído controles de coleta de lixo quando aplicativos de servidor podem ser excluídos.

trans-unit.source: Traditionally, distributed garbage collection uses reference counts and pinging for control.
trans-unit.target: Tradicionalmente, a coleta de lixo distribuída usa contagens de referência e executar o ping para o controle.

trans-unit.source: This works well when there are a few clients per object, but does not work well when there are thousands of clients per each object.
trans-unit.target: Isso funciona bem quando há alguns clientes por objeto, mas não funciona bem quando há milhares de clientes por cada objeto.

trans-unit.source: The lifetime service can assume the function of a traditional distributed garbage collector, and scales well when the number of clients increases.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de tempo de vida pode assumir a função de um coletor de lixo distribuído tradicional e escalas bem quando o número de clientes aumenta.

trans-unit.source: The lifetime service associates a lease with each remotely activated object.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de tempo de vida associa uma concessão de cada objeto ativado remotamente.

trans-unit.source: When the lease expires, the object is removed.
trans-unit.target: Quando a concessão expirar, o objeto é removido.

trans-unit.source: A lease can specify that an object has an infinite lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Uma concessão pode especificar que um objeto tem um tempo de vida infinito.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.AppDomain> contains a lease manager that administers the leases in the domain.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.AppDomain> contém um Gerenciador de concessão que administra as concessões no domínio.

trans-unit.source: The lease manager periodically examines the leases for time expiration.
trans-unit.target: O Gerenciador de concessão periodicamente examina as concessões de tempo de expiração.

trans-unit.source: If a lease has expired, it can either be canceled by removing its reference to the lease, or renewed by invoking one or more of the lease's sponsors.
trans-unit.target: Se uma concessão expirar, ela pode ser cancelada, removendo sua referência para a concessão, ou renovada com a invocação de um ou mais dos patrocinadores da concessão.

trans-unit.source: A lease contains properties that determine its policies, and methods that renew the lease time.
trans-unit.target: Uma concessão contém propriedades que determinam as políticas e os métodos que renovar o tempo de concessão.

trans-unit.source: The lease exposes the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease> interface.
trans-unit.target: A concessão expõe o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease> interface.

trans-unit.source: For an example showing how to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease> interface see [Lifetimes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/334a30e5-33cb-4f0f-a38a-ed4abc5560fa).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo mostrando como usar o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease> consulte interface [tempos de vida](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/334a30e5-33cb-4f0f-a38a-ed4abc5560fa).

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of time remaining on the lease.
The amount of time remaining on the lease.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de tempo restante da concessão.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LeaseState" /> of the lease.
The current <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LeaseState" /> of the lease.
trans-unit.target: Atual <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LeaseState" /> da concessão.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial time for the lease.
The initial time for the lease.
trans-unit.target: A hora inicial para a concessão.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.InitialLeaseTime%2A> property is set to <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then the lease will never time out and the object associated with it will have an infinite lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.InitialLeaseTime%2A> está definida como <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, a concessão nunca atingirá o tempo limite e o objeto associado a ele terá um tempo de vida infinito.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Registers a sponsor for the lease.
The callback object of the sponsor.
Registers a sponsor for the lease without renewing the lease.
If a sponsor is registered with the current method, the lease is not renewed.
trans-unit.target: Se um patrocinador é registrado com o método atual, a concessão não for renovada.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The callback object of the sponsor.
The length of time to renew the lease by.
Registers a sponsor for the lease, and renews it by the specified <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The length of time to renew the lease by.
Renews a lease for the specified time.
The new expiration time of the lease.
The lease time is set to the maximum of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> or the current time plus the renewal time.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de concessão é definido como o máximo da <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> ou a hora atual e o tempo de renovação.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time by which a call to the remote object renews the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime" />.
The amount of time by which a call to the remote object renews the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime" />.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de tempo pelo qual uma chamada para o objeto remoto renova o <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime" />.

trans-unit.source: When you make a call to a remote object, the lifetime service adds the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A> to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> only if the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> has dropped below the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você faz uma chamada para um objeto remoto, o serviço de tempo de vida adiciona o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A> para o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> somente se o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> caiu abaixo do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Sequential calls therefore do not increase the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> without bound.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas sequenciais, portanto, não aumentam o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> sem limite.

trans-unit.source: Instead, immediately after any call, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> is guaranteed to be the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A> or longer.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, imediatamente após qualquer chamada a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> é garantido para ser o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A> ou mais.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time to wait for a sponsor to return with a lease renewal time.
The amount of time to wait for a sponsor to return with a lease renewal time.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de tempo de espera para um patrocinador retornar com um tempo de renovação da concessão.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.SponsorshipTimeout%2A> is <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then this lease will not take sponsors.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.SponsorshipTimeout%2A> é <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, em seguida, essa concessão não terão patrocinadores.

trans-unit.source: If a sponsor does not respond to a call to renew a lease within the time-out period, it is assumed to be dead and is removed from the list of sponsors for the current lease.
trans-unit.target: Se um patrocinador não responder a uma chamada para renovar uma concessão dentro do período de tempo limite, ele será considerado inativo e é removido da lista de patrocinadores para a concessão atual.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The lease sponsor to unregister.
Removes a sponsor from the sponsor list.
The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.
